code_examples.code:
from typing import Generic, TypeVar, List, Union, Any, Coroutine, Tuple

Socket = Union[socket.socket, asyncio.StreamWriter]
Message = Tuple[bytes, Socket]

class EchoServer(Generic[T]):
  def __init__(self)
    self.sockets: List[T] = []

  async def broadcast(self, message: Message) -> Coroutine:
    for sock in self.sockets:
      await sock[1].sendto(*message)

  async def serve_forever(self) -> None:
    while True:
      conn, addr = await self.server_socket.accept()
      self.sockets.append((conn, addr))
      print('Connected by', addr)
      await self.broadcast((b'Hello, World!', conn))
      self.sockets.remove((conn, addr))

if __name__ == '__main__':
  server = EchoServer[socket.socket]
  server_socket = socket.create_server(('localhost', 8888), server_class=socket.socket)
  server.serve_forever()
